metadata.description: MCP servers and skills for AI-powered life sciences research

plugins.name: hgnc
plugins.description: HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee — gene symbol search and lookup via HGNC CURIEs

plugins.name: uniprot
plugins.description: UniProt protein knowledgebase — protein search and lookup via UniProtKB accessions

plugins.name: chembl
plugins.description: ChEMBL bioactivity database — compound search, lookup, and batch retrieval

plugins.name: opentargets
plugins.description: Open Targets Platform — target search, lookup, and disease-target associations

plugins.name: string
plugins.description: STRING protein interaction database — protein search, interactions, and network images

plugins.name: biogrid
plugins.description: BioGRID interaction repository — gene search and genetic/protein interactions

plugins.name: ensembl
plugins.description: Ensembl genome browser — gene search, lookup, and transcript retrieval

plugins.name: entrez
plugins.description: NCBI Entrez Gene — gene search, lookup, and PubMed cross-references

plugins.name: pubchem
plugins.description: PubChem compound database — compound search and detailed lookup

plugins.name: iuphar
plugins.description: IUPHAR/BPS Guide to Pharmacology — ligand and target search and lookup

plugins.name: wikipathways
plugins.description: WikiPathways biological pathway database — pathway search, lookup, and component analysis

plugins.name: clinicaltrials
plugins.description: ClinicalTrials.gov — trial search, details, and location information

plugins.name: domain-skills
plugins.description: Six life sciences research skills — genomics, proteomics, pharmacology, clinical, CRISPR, and graph-builder

plugins.name: platform-tools
plugins.description: Platform engineering tools — FastMCP scaffolding commands and security review skill

plugins.name: speckit
plugins.description: SpecKit SDLC workflow — 9 specification-driven development commands
